MESSAGE.name: DocumentToDjVu.already_jb2
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Using an already processed JB2 matcher

MESSAGE.name: DocumentToDjVu.no_pages1
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Unable to find pages in range %1!s! in the source stream.

MESSAGE.name: DocumentToDjVu.no_subsample
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Subsampling is not supported for bitonal documents.

MESSAGE.name: DocumentToDjVu.no_upsample
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Upsampling is not supported for bitonal documents.

MESSAGE.name: DocumentToDjVu.only_one_chunk
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Only one JPEG chunk is allowed with JPEG DjVu

MESSAGE.name: DocumentToDjVu.photoisbitonal
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Cannot encode bitonal page as photo

BODY.MESSAGE: %1!s! Use background color in the small intervals between characters.

MESSAGE.name: --fg-quality
MESSAGE.value: %1!s!=<1-100> Foreground quality (1 is lowest quality, 75 is default).

MESSAGE.name: --mask-upsample
MESSAGE.value: %1!s!=<1-3> Mask and target DjVu image upsample ratio.

BODY.MESSAGE: %1!s!=<0-100> Foreground pixel filter. (0 is maximum foreground.)
%1!s!=<1,2> Use 1 unless input resolution is above 450dpi.

MESSAGE.name: --scale-normalize
MESSAGE.value: %1!s!=<1-> Use a scale other than 100 for normalized values.

BODY.MESSAGE: %1!s!=<0-100> Foreground shape filter. (0 is maximum foreground.)
%1!s!=<B,C,N> Encode the JB2Layer as B="Bitonal JB2" or C="Color JB2;" Use "N" for no JB2 layer.
